## Summary  
Briefly describe the task.

## Goal  
What this should achieve when complete.

## Requirements  
List everything Codex needs to complete:

- Functional expectations  
- API or schema updates  
- UI adjustments  
- Test updates  
- Any acceptance criteria  

## Definition of Done  
This task is complete when:

- [ ] Code compiles and passes CI  
- [ ] Tests are written or updated  
- [ ] UI/UX matches requirements (if applicable)  
- [ ] Linked PR includes correct issue references (`Fixes #<id>`)  
- [ ] Board status automatically transitions to **Done**
